documents.document: @DrNO_NC @Meaningness @Kalieezchild Thank you for the wonderful discourse. I really appreciate it!!
@DrNO_NC @Meaningness @Kalieezchild it's a basic desire - to be 'more' fulfilled.
@DrNO_NC @Meaningness @Kalieezchild The bigger question would be - what had you hoped you would experience from achieving such a goal?
@Meaningness @DrNO_NC This recognizes the fluidity of thought - one time good - next time not so good. What lies underneath it?
@Meaningness @DrNO_NC Yes, useful perhaps for a short term - but long term, the goal will constantly change. That's all.
@Meaningness @DrNO_NC I hear that - but again 'pragmatically' is subjective. Better is only determined an individual's story about life
@Meaningness @DrNO_NC One cannot improve thought. It simply arises. Seeing it as an 'object' is possible - and is the 'goal' in itself.
@Meaningness @DrNO_NC using thought to improve thought is a fools errand. Any and all 'gains' are purely subjective.
@AncestryCA Nothing, actually...
@VIAwesome Not a photo from 1974 - the vehicles are not of that vintage
@morethanmySLE Yes, I saw this too. Only days after an official reassurance no such discrimination would occur.
@IMSA waking up on the west coast - catching up with your tweets - OUTSTANDING & entertaining work - thank you!!!
@PathlessWay One cannot 'stop thinking' - but can allow thought to arise and decay without attaching focus to it
@PathlessWay The same as photo of an apple give no hint of it's taste...
@M_Wayne Selling a 'better future' which does not exist has no appeal. What is forever changeless - be here now - is the only point of focus
@TheZenGardner Ha Ha! He certainly will, if that's a sarcastic take on it! (as in: shit = nothing)
@smerconish Really like the polls you do - thanks for inviting input!!
@2upTogether @BMWMotorrad @senabluetooth Thanks for sharing these! Oh man, summer get here faster!!
What an impressive display of democracy today. Time and energy spent by many to join and deliver a unified message - heard loud and clear
@beingsoShoel seeing that moment of speechlessness was more than worth It! Fine friends indeed - it's an honor to be in such great company!
@Zen_Guy there is no future - that's duality to a tee
@Kalieezchild @BentinhoMassaro most stables smell of shit too
@BigDogsVancity wondered where you went!
@jeanjeanw5 so be it!
@jeanjeanw5 Here's a bottom line: https://t.co/P5jvV6MIaV
@Nollowa @MaxGraham @BijouBoston don't make him wait pho ever!
@Jayytteee self analysis NOT to improve, but to clearly see what IS - that which underlies all experience / life
@MoebiusArt1 @wilw Is that a cape or a really huge newspaper?
@VanishingBlue Especially in space, where 'no one can hear you scream'
@joshelledge @EmpoweredByJohn Be advised, this is a quote from the Dan Millman book "Way of the peaceful.." NOT the real Socrates...
@Jayytteee and then you realize there is no mountain or path, not even a 'you'
VanDusen Botanical Gardens - Christmas Lights right after a snowfall https://t.co/xr3Up4OW73
@Kalieezchild @TalyaEidelman The key indicator here is 'MY world'. Ugh, no. Definitely a story woven from a need to be 'special' & different
@SarahKSilverman If you listen carefully, Joe is saying it's patriotism solely to MONEY, not a country or the people within it.
@vedicfolkscom uh, no. Nice story, and only a story. To propose one story over another story as a remedy for dissatisfaction is foolhardy
@Kalieezchild As with most 'teachings' - one may not mess with an original 'narrative'. Leads to loss of control for those in 'charge'
@nikonrumors dump yahoo - that's faster!
@ZENShredding oh yeah! Know it all too well
@Kalieezchild @SriSri it's the grifter 'lifter'
@Kalieezchild @TranshumanWoman @FutureThinkers_ @leashless yup, misses the boat on nearly every level. Future? Decisions? Choices? Crap
In her favorite place - a tube https://t.co/5OOiKqSONy
@Kalieezchild @SriNithyananda 'rare living avatar'? - more like 'duplicitous lying sack of shit' x 10 for vigorous self promotion
@midnight big trouble in little China syndrome
@santaspice It's not where the believer seeks - which was the point of the first tweet. Unity is all there is, all else believed is illusion
@santaspice there is never a moment without unity - only a believer who believes they are separate. All is quite literally 'God Willing'
@santaspice 'others' = BLIND. Blind telling the blind what they think they heard from those who 'see' is often very misleading
@SwamiDoseDaily philosophical 'truths' can only ever be religiously believed-keeping believers in story, evading the experience of 'reality'
@TheZenGardner take it as a compliment! Being outside the herd dynamic is the best place IMO
@TheZenGardner beautifully put, and solidly true for many
'If I don't feel loving or connected, I have to look to my own mind' - Bryon Katie
@ZENShredding nailed it right on the head. The single greatest addiction.
@MaxGraham new floors are worth the wait!
@MaxGraham I hope they actually take a month and not longer with the clean up. 'Pain in the ass' - mild understatement!
@Kalieezchild Andy was such a prick. Probably still is.
@ZENShredding you could also say it as thought believing thinker
@SwamiDoseDaily all boil down to thoughts. There is no 'doer', only thought arising
@SwamiDoseDaily wrong on both counts. If no one is here, who's mind or intellect is at play?
@SwamiDoseDaily 'you' can't drop the 'I', it can only be seen past.
'People with too much freedom and a sense of entitlement are the most sophisticated and persistent con artists on the planet' - Mark Mushet
@Starbucks4359 from my workplace to yours!
@Kalieezchild Yeah, that's fair.
@Kalieezchild which basically implies NEVER
@kleinenberg that's how it happens to pretty much everything.
'Religion was invented when the first con man met the first fool' - Mark Twain
@TheZenGardner @2weelz thank you!
@TheZenGardner what is a TENS unit?
@Porsche countless? Bet you could tell me without the slightest hesitation!
@ReformedBroker Great stuff! Thought provoking and an unconventional view. Well done!
@wmiddelkoop yup, demonized what you want to control.
@Kalieezchild nice stories and notions, but not much else
Wonderful video on the simplicity of non-duality. Watch "Life in Freefall" on @Vimeo https://t.co/Rwo4UIOgqu
@ZENShredding Congratulations on another book!
@Kalieezchild @EckTOLLEQuotes so what you mean to say is: crap spewing forth from a spiritual prostitute?
It's Roy Batty's incept day! #BladeRunner #RoyBatty https://t.co/ZxlGrj7FQ7
@TheZenGardner not a waste of time, but it's true that few have the fortitude or will to uncover that which is 'permanent'
If Kermit the Frog & Bugs Bunny could have a love child, it just might look like Dr Seuss's Grinch
@TheZenGardner mmmm.... Coffee... Must make now...
@jeanjeanw5 @tricyclemag Apparently 'someone', but in reality, no one. The 'truth' cannot be told, for there is no one to tell it too...
@SwamiDoseDaily Emotions = thoughts. Thoughts believed sap anyone's energy
@TheZenGardner Thanks for sharing your wealth here...
@mtaibbi Ben Carson!! did I guess right?
@torquilcampbell yup, the ol' 'do as I say, not as I do' bullshit.
Only the mind that believes what it thinks is capable of creating imperfection - BK
Jeb can fix it? Campaign slogan based on his brothers win in 2000?
It's only ever TODAY
@Kalieezchild @dailyzen especially when you're teaed off...
@Kalieezchild @JamesGleick you nailed it Jody - ca$h greases the deal
@GaryJanetti @SethMacFarlane 'Christians' would be the first to call him Satan...
@TheZenGardner we each create our own BELEIFS about the world around us, and still have zero control over what actually happens.
Finding the 'way' leaves no trace behind, and you need to be comfortable with walking into a misty fog in front of you.
It's often never what you plan (for), but it's always what you have (around 'you' right now)
@jeanjeanw5 correct on both counts. What 'seems' to be happening is merely an interpretation of ultimately neutral events
"The unexpected is bound to happen, while the anticipated may never come." - Nisargadatta
@jeanjeanw5 does the infinite oneness supersede the apparent separation within it?
@jeanjeanw5 yes, fear is what keeps the appearance of a separate self alive. Yet, that which IS is indivisible - regardless of appearances.
@jeanjeanw5 if you faced the fear of the loss of individuality and got through it, would you fear anything anymore?
You cannot earn what is already YOUrs
Change in Alberta! Astonishing results - never thought I'd see such sweeping change!
The absence of the self as the center of behavioural expression is the condition of the freedom to love - R. Wolfe
@ZENShredding the statement is just as true if you drop 'spiritually speaking'
